name: Enhanced Android Backup
summary: An ABEX file is an enhanced Android backup ( .AB ) file created by Droid Explorer, a Windows program used to manage Android devices and files. In addition to typical Android backup data, ABEX files contain a header that ties the backup file to a specific Android device. ABEX files are created using Droid Explorer's Device Backup feature and stored in a folder named Android Backups .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
